ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Highpass Keep
ygData.msgSnippet: I spent most of the last five lvls in highkeep. I have helped break the spawn several times and hardly ever do we pull to guards. My point is that it doesnt
ygData.messageBody:
I spent most of the last five lvls in highkeep. I have
helped break the spawn several times and hardly ever
do we pull to guards. My point is that it doesnt have
to be that way. The reason I stay in HK is that the
inevitable deaths (see comment on not pulling to
guards) do NOT require a long corpse retrieval run. I
LOVE being able to be bound in the zone I'm fighting
in. Yes there are some REALLY dumb ppl in HK, but if
i end up in a group with one of them, I amazingly am
needed elsewhere soon...

Oh, and on bristlebane, KSing in HK is NOT ok. (It
still is ok at the orcs alas) Anyone who pulls other
than their spawns and doesnt apologize and offer the
other group the next spawn is ostricized and I will
leave a group that is taking the ramp or the stairs
with out being asked by the group it belongs to.
--- "Kevin L. Crawford" <Lyrnia@...> wrote:
> As I said, not everyone comes out of HK affected by
> the bad habits it
> encourages

=====
Harmonie Moonsong
<Lost Souls of Norrath>
29th Composition in Progress
High Keep, Norrath, Bristlebane server
http://www.geocities.com/harmoniemoonsong
